description:
Combi Dissolution!? Chip Tap: Chevy, Coron and Panky went to the beach one day to have fun. But then, the trio sew Chip and Tap arguing each other for no apparent reason. As they consulted the two, the comedy duo were at each other due to one of routines gone wrong and decides to break up. Worse of all, the duo wanted either a new member to be either part of their group. The trio consulted Lily, however it didn`t help them. Now, Chevy and her friends must do everything to get the two back together.
Riding the Bubble: Chevy and her friends were going to Winny`s happitat to look at his new invention: a machine that can blow giant bubbles and doesn`t crack when poked or touched. Chevy and her friends are amazed on the new invention, despite the flaws. However that night, the machine is stolen by someone and the whole happitat is in a mess. Winny is in a panic as they all trace down the culprit all over Candy Land, until they found out who did it as it causes trouble to everyone.

titles.title: Combi Dissolution!? Chip Tap / Riding the Bubble
Combi Kaisan!? Chip Tap / Shabondama ni Notte
コンビ解散!? チップタップ / しゃぼん玉に乗って
